query.ejb-ql: select p.salary from Team t, in(t.players) as p where t = ?1 and p.name = ?2
select object(t) from Team t

query.description: Selector single object String with LOCATE
query.ejb-ql: select distinct t.name from Team t where LOCATE(?1, t.name) > 0 AND LOCATE(?1, t.name) < LENGTH(t.name)
select object(t) from Team t, in(t.players) as p where p = ?1 and t.league = ?2
select object(t) from Team t, in(t.players) as p where p = ?1 and t.league = ?2

query.description: Selector single object String with SUBSTRING
query.ejb-ql: select t.name from Team t where t.name = SUBSTRING(?1, 5, 5)

query.description: Selector single object String with CONCAT
query.ejb-ql: select t.name from Team t where t.name = CONCAT(?1, ?2)
select object(p) from Player p where p.position IN ('goalkeeper', 'defender')
select distinct object(p) from Player p where p.position = ?1
select distinct object(p) from Player p, in (p.teams) as t where t.league.sport = ?1
select object(p) from Player p where p.salary = ABS(?1)
select object(p) from Player p
select distinct object(p) from Player p where p.position = ?1 and p.name = ?2

query.description: Finder using the MEMBER OF Expression
query.ejb-ql: select object(p) from Player p where ?1 MEMBER p.teams
select object(p) from Player p where p.teams is empty

query.description: Finder using the IS NULL Expression
query.ejb-ql: select object(p) from Player p where p.name IS NULL
select distinct t.league.sport from Player p, in (p.teams) as t where p = ?1
select distinct object(p) from Player p where p.salary between ?1 and ?2
select distinct object(p1) from Player p1, Player p2 where p1.salary > p2.salary and p2.name = ?1
select distinct object(p) from Player p, in (p.teams) as t where t.city = ?1
select object(p) from Player p where p.name LIKE '%on'
select distinct object(p) from Player p where p.name = ?1
select distinct t.league from Player p, in (p.teams) as t where p = ?1
select object(p) from Player p where p.salary = SQRT(?1)
select distinct object(p) from Player p, in (p.teams) as t where t.league = ?1
select object(l) from League l
select distinct t.name from League l, in(l.teams) as t where t.city = ?1
select distinct t.city from Team t where t.league = ?1

query.description: Selector returning Set using multiple collection declarations with remote params
query.ejb-ql: select Object(p) from League l, in(l.teams) as t, in(t.players) p where l = ?1
select distinct Object(t) from League l, in(l.teams) as t where t.city = ?1
select object(t) from Team t where t.league = ?1
select distinct Object(t) from League l, in(l.teams) as t where t.city = ?1
select object(l) from League l where l.name = ?1

query.description: Selector returning Set using multiple collection declarations
query.ejb-ql: select Object(p) from League l, in(l.teams) as t, in(t.players) p where l = ?1
